sentence: The  hostage-release  deal  under  discussion  could  come  in  exchange  for  the  freedom  of  scores  of  Palestinian  prisoners  and  a  temporary  pause  in  hostilities  in  the  ongoing  war  that  has  killed  some  1,200  Israelis  and  nearly  13,000  Gazans,  according  to  Palestinian  officials.
In  northern  Gaza  on  Monday,  the  Hamas-run  territory's  health  ministry  said  at  least  a  dozen  people  were  killed  at  another  hospital  during  Israeli  shelling.
